name: Emim%27Ai
content:
Emim'Ai was a female Mirialan bounty hunter who relentlessly pursued a scoundrel named Misook in order to make a name for herself among her superiors. During the First Order-Resistance War, Rey lied to another bounty hunter, Kief Varris that Emim'Ai attempted to capture Moebin Faltus at one point.
Emim'Ai first appeared in the short story Chasing Ghosts in the novel Myths & Fables, written by George Mann with illustrations by Grant Griffin.
